snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes WordPress agreeing to accept a virtual currency, some very expensive Twinkies offered for sale on eBay and a look...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes WordPress agreeing to accept a virtual currency, some very expensive Twinkies offered for sale on eBay and a look at the technology team that helped President Obama get re-elected.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: EBay Twinkies and Obama's Engineers
